result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Tyrese J. Merriam

records.addlTxt: Re: Order to Withdraw as Counsel
Notice of Motion and Motion for Leave to Withdraw as Counsel of Record
Review hearing on November 9, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Pre-trial conference on November 16, 2022 at 10:15 am.

Includes cases 22CM678 and 22CF1248. No contact with victim(s): A.J.M. (22Cm678), G.R.M. (22CF1248). Contact includes direct personal or physical and indirect contact by phone, in writing of any kind, entry to the person's residence or place of employment together with contacts through other persons.  Contact, however, may be made through the defendant's attorney. Shall have his/her fingerprints and photograph taken at the Sheriff's Dept.

Case Called: 1:45 p.m.
Clerk: Nicole.
INCLUDES: 22CF64, 22CF881, 22CF1248, 22CM678.
State appears by ADA Rory McGarry.
Defendant appears in custody from MCJ with Atty Peter Vu.
Date and Time Set for Competency Hearing 22CF881:IA 22CF1248 and 22CF678. VRCW.

COMPETENCY HEARING 22CF881>>>>
Parties are in receipt of Dr. Lynch's report.
Defense not contesting.
COURT receives Doc. 13. and adopts findings.
COURT makes findings and finds defendant is competent to proceed.

INITIAL APPEARANCE>> 
Reading Waived.  Reserve Jurisdiction. 
PLEA: Not Guilty on 22CM678.

COURT ORDERS: $2,000.00 signature bond for both files.

CONDITIONS: 
- No contact with victim(s): A.J.M.(22CM678), G.R.M. (22CF1248).
- Prints and photograph. 

DATES:
PH: 11/9/22 @ 9:00 a.m. (22CF1248) Branch 1.
PTC: 11/16/22 @ 10:15 a.m.

Adjourned: 1:50 p.m.
Initial Appearance on October 24, 2022 at 01:45 pm.
